answers.answer: Hi,The effect of stroke varies depending on the size and location of the lesion. Sometimes, if the cerebral cortex is involved,it can produce visual defect, memory deficits and even disorganized thinking, confusion, or  hypersexual gestures.  But it is also important that his blood sugar be controlled . Talk to your doctor for proper management.  This link may be helpful: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stroke#SubtypesTake care and regards.
